label: Renewable Energy
description: Market category encompassing search queries related to renewable energy sources and providers.
intents: Find information on renewable energy sources
Learn about renewable energy facts and benefits

subcategories.label: Solar Energy
subcategories.description: Energy derived from the sun through the use of solar panels and other technologies.

subcategories.label: Wind Energy
subcategories.description: Energy derived from wind turbines and other technologies that harness wind power.

subcategories.label: Water Harvesting
subcategories.description: The collection and storage of rainwater and other sources of water for later use.

subcategories.label: Energy Comparison
subcategories.description: Comparison of energy providers and tariffs to find the best deals.

subcategories.label: Smart Meters
subcategories.description: Digital meters that measure and report energy usage in real-time.
subtopics: Pay as you go electric meter
